message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $100. We believe it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I believe it's a bit higher than its worth, considering I've done some research on similar products.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we're willing to consider $95 as the price for the product. We appreciate your feedback and hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
We understand your concerns, Bob. Considering the value and quality of our product, we are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer is $90 for the product. We hope this proposal works for you.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close as possible to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $87.50. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

We're glad to hear that you're willing to negotiate, Bob. After careful consideration, we're proposing a final offer of $92.5 for the product. This reflects the value and quality of our product while also considering your budget constraints.
